column7: at his home in osage. a funeral mass will be held at 10:30 a. m. wednesday
column10: at st. peters catholic church in new haven with rev. steve garner officiating. burial will be at st. peters catholic cemetery in new haven with military honors at the grave by osage american legion post 278 and osage v. f. w. post 7920. visitation will be from 5:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. tuesday at the champion-bucheit funeral home in osage. a more complete obituary will be posted later. champion - bucheit funeral home (641)732-3706
